verses.verse: And He <S%G308>looked<s%> up and <S%G3708>saw<s%> the <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G906>putting<s%> their <S%G1435>gifts<s%> into the <S%G1049>treasury.<s%>
And He <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3998>poor<s%> <S%G5503>widow<s%> <S%G906>putting<s%> in <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3016>small<s%> <S%G3016>copper<s%> <S%G3016>coins.<s%>
And He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G230>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G5503>widow<s%> <S%G906>put<s%> in <S%G4183>more<s%> than <S%G3956>all<s%> [of them;]

for they <S%G3956>all<s%> out of their <S%G4052>surplus<s%> <S%G906>put<s%> into the <S%G1435>offering;<s%> but she out of her <S%G5303>poverty<s%> <S%G906>put<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> that she <S%G2192>had<s%> to <S%G979>live<s%> on. "

And while <S%G5100>some<s%> were <S%G3004>talking<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> that it was <S%G2885>adorned<s%> with <S%G2570>beautiful<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> and <S%G334>votive<s%> <S%G334>gifts,<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%>

"[As for] <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you are <S%G2334>looking<s%> at, the <S%G2250>days<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> in <S%G3739>which<s%> there will not be <S%G863>left<s%> one <S%G3037>stone<s%> upon <S%G3037>another<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> will not be <S%G2647>torn<s%> <S%G2647>down.<s%>"

And they <S%G1905>questioned<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>"Teacher,<s%> <S%G4219>when<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> will <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> be? And <S%G5101>what<s%> [will be] the <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> are <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G1096>take<s%> <S%G1096>place<s%>?"

And He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G991>"See<s%> to it that you be not <S%G4105>misled;<s%> for <S%G4183>many<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> in My <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> 'I <S%G1510>am<s%> [He],' and, 'The <S%G2540>time<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand<s%>'; do not <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> them.

"And <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G191>hear<s%> of <S%G4171>wars<s%> and <S%G181>disturbances,<s%> do not be <S%G4422>terrified;<s%> for <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1096>take<s%> <S%G1096>place<s%> <S%G4413>first,<s%> but the <S%G5056>end<s%> [does] not [follow] <S%G2112>immediately.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> He continued by <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G1484>"Nation<s%> will <S%G1453>rise<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1484>nation,<s%> and <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G932>kingdom,<s%>

and there will be <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquakes,<s%> and in <S%G2596>various<s%> <S%G5117>places<s%> <S%G3061>plagues<s%> and <S%G3042>famines;<s%> and there will be <S%G5400>terrors<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

"But <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> they will <S%G1911>lay<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> on you and will <S%G1377>persecute<s%> you, <S%G3860>delivering<s%> you to the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> and <S%G5438>prisons,<s%> <S%G520>bringing<s%> you <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G935>kings<s%> and <S%G2232>governors<s%> for My name's <S%G1752>sake.<s%>
"It will <S%G576>lead<s%> to an opportunity for your <S%G3142>testimony.<s%>
<S%G3767>"So<s%> <S%G5087>make<s%> up your <S%G2588>minds<s%> not to <S%G4304>prepare<s%> <S%G4304>beforehand<s%> to <S%G626>defend<s%> yourselves;

for I will <S%G1325>give<s%> you <S%G4750>utterance<s%> and <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3756>none<s%> <S%G537><s%> of your <S%G480>opponents<s%> will be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G436>resist<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G471>refute.<s%>

"But you will be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> up <S%G2532>even<s%> by <S%G1118>parents<s%> and <S%G80>brothers<s%> and <S%G4773>relatives<s%> and <S%G5384>friends,<s%> and they will <S%G2289>put<s%> [some] of you to <S%G2289>death,<s%>
and you will be <S%G3404>hated<s%> by <S%G3956>all<s%> on <S%G1223>account<s%> of My <S%G3686>name.<s%>
<S%G2532>"Yet<s%> not a <S%G2359>hair<s%> of your <S%G2776>head<s%> will <S%G622>perish.<s%>
"By your <S%G5281>endurance<s%> you will <S%G2932>gain<s%> your <S%G5590>lives.<s%>

"But <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G2944>surrounded<s%> by <S%G4760>armies,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G1097>recognize<s%> that her <S%G2050>desolation<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand.<s%>

<S%G5119>"Then<s%> let <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are in <S%G2453>Judea<s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> to the <S%G3735>mountains,<s%> and let <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are in the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G846>city<s%> <S%G1633>depart,<s%> and let not <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are in the <S%G5561>country<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> the <S%G846>city;<s%>

<S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> are <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G1557>vengeance,<s%> in order that <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> which are <S%G1125>written<s%> may be <S%G4092>fulfilled.<s%>

<S%G3759>"Woe<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are with <S%G1722>child<s%> <S%G1064><s%> and to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2337>nurse<s%> <S%G2337>babes<s%> in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days;<s%> for there will be <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G318>distress<s%> upon the <S%G1093>land,<s%> and <S%G3709>wrath<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2992>people,<s%>

and they will <S%G4098>fall<s%> by the <S%G4750>edge<s%> of the <S%G3162>sword,<s%> and will be <S%G163>led<s%> <S%G163>captive<s%> into <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations;<s%> and <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> will be <S%G3961>trampled<s%> <S%G3961>under<s%> foot by the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2540>times<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> be <S%G4137>fulfilled.<s%>

"And there will be <S%G4592>signs<s%> in <S%G2246>sun<s%> and <S%G4582>moon<s%> and <S%G798>stars,<s%> and upon the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G4928>dismay<s%> among <S%G1484>nations,<s%> in <S%G640>perplexity<s%> at the <S%G2279>roaring<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%> and the <S%G4535>waves,<s%>

<S%G444>men<s%> <S%G674>fainting<s%> from <S%G5401>fear<s%> and the <S%G4329>expectation<s%> of the things which are <S%G1904>coming<s%> upon the <S%G3625>world;<s%> for the <S%G1411>powers<s%> of the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> will be <S%G4531>shaken.<s%>

"And <S%G5119>then<s%> they will <S%G3708>see<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> in a <S%G3507>cloud<s%> with <S%G1411>power<s%> and <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

"But when <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G757>begin<s%> to <S%G1096>take<s%> <S%G1096>place,<s%> <S%G352>straighten<s%> up and <S%G1869>lift<s%> up your <S%G2776>heads,<s%> <S%G1360>because<s%> your <S%G629>redemption<s%> is <S%G1448>drawing<s%> <S%G1448>near.<s%>"
And He <S%G3004>told<s%> them a <S%G3850>parable:<s%> <S%G3708>"Behold<s%> the <S%G4808>fig<s%> <S%G4808>tree<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1186>trees;<s%>

as <S%G3752>soon<s%> <S%G2235><s%> as they <S%G4261>put<s%> <S%G4261>forth<s%> [leaves,] you <S%G991>see<s%> it and <S%G1097>know<s%> for <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> that <S%G2330>summer<s%> is <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G1451>near.<s%>

<S%G2532>"Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> you, <S%G2532>too,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> you <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G1096>happening,<s%> <S%G1097>recognize<s%> that the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1451>near.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> will not <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1096>take<s%> <S%G1096>place.<s%>
<S%G3772>"Heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth<s%> will <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away,<s%> but My <S%G3056>words<s%> will not <S%G3928>pass<s%> <S%G3928>away.<s%>

"Be on <S%G4337>guard,<s%> that your <S%G2588>hearts<s%> may not be <S%G916>weighted<s%> <S%G916>down<s%> with <S%G2897>dissipation<s%> and <S%G3178>drunkenness<s%> and the <S%G3308>worries<s%> of <S%G982>life,<s%> and that <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2186>come<s%> on you <S%G160>suddenly<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G3803>trap;<s%>
for it will <S%G7076>come<s%> upon <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2521>dwell<s%> on the <S%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

"But <S%G69>keep<s%> on the <S%G69>alert<s%> at <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2540>times,<s%> <S%G1189>praying<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that you may <S%G2729>have<s%> <S%G2729>strength<s%> to <S%G1628>escape<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> that are <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G1096>take<s%> <S%G1096>place,<s%> and to <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> during the <S%G2250>day<s%> He was <S%G1321>teaching<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> but at <S%G3571>evening<s%> He would <S%G1831>go<s%> out and <S%G835>spend<s%> the <S%G835>night<s%> on the <S%G3735>mount<s%> that is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G1638>Olivet.<s%>
And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> would <S%G3719>get<s%> up <S%G3719>early<s%> in the <S%G3719>morning<s%> [to come] to Him in the <S%G2413>temple<s%> to <S%G191>listen<s%> to Him.
